entries.label: Pinpoint
entries.description: An all-in-one applicant tracking system designed to streamline the hiring process by organising tasks such as discovering, approaching, reviewing, interviewing, and hiring candidates suitable for your requirements and work culture.

entries.label: PoppAI
entries.description: PoppAI is an AI-driven platform designed to screen applicants efficiently and engage candidates through conversations.

entries.label: HireSweet
entries.description: HireSweet is a Candidate Relationship Management (CRM) tool that leverages AI to source and nurture candidates. It simplifies candidate tracking, outreach automation, and pipeline management, helping recruiters build long-term relationships.

entries.label: Apollo
entries.description: A sales intelligence and engagement platform that provides access to a vast database of contacts and companies, helping businesses find and connect with potential customers.

entries.label: Hubspot
entries.description: A comprehensive CRM platform offering tools for marketing, sales, customer service, and content management to help businesses grow and manage customer relationships effectively.

entries.label: Lattice
entries.description: A people management platform that helps companies align, engage, and grow their employees through performance management, employee engagement surveys, and career development tools.

entries.label: Workramp
entries.description: A learning management system that provides training and development solutions for employees, helping organisations onboard, train, and develop their teams effectively.

entries.label: Hibob
entries.description: HiBob is a modern HR platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering features like employee management, payroll, and performance tracking to streamline HR processes.

entries.label: Loxo
entries.description: Loxo is a talent intelligence platform that combines an applicant tracking system (ATS), customer relationship management (CRM), and AI-driven sourcing to enhance recruitment efficiency.

entries.label: Eightfold.ai
entries.description: Eightfold.ai offers a Talent Intelligence Platform that uses AI to help companies with talent acquisition, management, and diversity initiatives by analysing skills and potential.

entries.label: retrain.ai
entries.description: Retrain.ai provides an AI-powered talent intelligence platform that helps organisations identify skill gaps, reskill employees, and optimise workforce planning.

entries.label: phenom
entries.description: Phenom is a Talent Experience Management (TXM) platform that uses AI to enhance the experiences of candidates, recruiters, employees, and management throughout the talent lifecycle.

entries.label: HireEz
entries.description: HireEz (formerly Hiretual) is an AI-powered outbound recruiting platform that helps recruiters source and engage candidates across various channels efficiently.

entries.label: SWARM
entries.description: SWARM is a collaborative hiring platform that enables teams to work together on candidate evaluation, interview scheduling, and feedback collection to improve hiring outcomes.

entries.label: Findem.ai
entries.description: Findem.ai is a talent acquisition platform that uses AI to help companies discover, engage, and hire candidates based on comprehensive attribute data.

entries.label: Jiminny
entries.description: This a conversation intelligence platform. Jiminny's AI turns every email, phone and video call into game-changing insights, revenue intelligence and business-winning behaviours.

entries.label: Gong
entries.description: Gong is a revenue intelligence platform that analyses sales conversations and provides insights to improve sales team performance and customer interactions.

entries.label: Gatekeeper
entries.description: Gatekeeper is a vendor and contract management solution that helps organisations manage supplier relationships, contracts, and compliance through a centralised platform.

entries.label: Beamery
entries.description: Beamery is a talent lifecycle management platform that assists companies in attracting, engaging, and retaining talent through AI-driven insights and automation.

entries.label: Adway
entries.description: Adway is a talent acquisition platform that uses artificial intelligence (AI) to help companies find candidates on social media. Adway integrates with a company's career page and applicant tracking system (ATS).

entries.label: App Cast
entries.description: Appcast is a service that helps companies post job openings and manage applications on mobile devices. It also helps companies attract talent by using data and technology.

entries.label: HiredScore
entries.description: HiredScore is an AI-powered HR technology that integrates with existing systems to enhance talent acquisition and management through data-driven insights and automation.

entries.label: SkyHive
entries.description: SkyHive uses artificial intelligence to provide labor market intelligence, helping organisations with workforce planning, reskilling, and talent acquisition strategies.

entries.label: Noebrain
entries.description: Noebrain offers AI-driven solutions for talent assessment and development, focusing on cognitive and behavioral evaluations to enhance hiring and training processes.

entries.label: Reejig
entries.description: Reejig is a workforce intelligence platform that uses ethical AI to provide insights into workforce skills, enabling better talent mobility and reskilling initiatives.

entries.label: gloat
entries.description: Gloat offers an AI-powered talent marketplace that connects employees with internal opportunities, fostering career development and organisational agility.

entries.label: ArcticShores
entries.description: Arctic Shores provides behavior-based assessments that combine neuroscience, AI, and game technology to evaluate candidates' potential and fit for roles.

entries.label: Willo
entries.description: Willo is a video interviewing platform that allows recruiters to conduct pre-recorded video interviews, enabling asynchronous candidate evaluation while saving time.

entries.label: Metaview
entries.description: Metaview automates the process of transcribing interviews and generating summaries. It provides recruiters with structured feedback and actionable insights, ensuring a more objective and consistent hiring process.

entries.label: Fireflies
entries.description: An AI meeting assistant that records, transcribes, and analyses meetings, making it easier to capture and review important information from discussions.

entries.label: Internal Chatbot (Stan)
entries.description: An internal chatbot named Stan designed to assist employees with various tasks, answer questions, and provide support within our organisation.

entries.label: ChatGPT
entries.description: An AI language model developed by OpenAI that can generate human-like text, enabling applications such as chatbots, content creation, and more.

entries.label: Perplexity AI
entries.description: Perplexity is a free AI search engine designed to revolutionize the way you discover information. Ask any question, and it searches the internet.

entries.label: Vitally.io
entries.description: Vitally.io is a customer success platform that helps teams organize customer data, automate workflows, and generate insights.

entries.label: Xero
entries.description: A cloud-based accounting software platform designed for small and medium-sized businesses, offering tools for invoicing, expense management, and financial reporting.

entries.label: Notion
entries.description: An all-in-one workspace that combines note-taking, task management, and database functions, allowing teams to collaborate and organise their work efficiently.

entries.label: Lucidchart
entries.description: A web-based diagramming tool that enables users to create flowcharts, organisational charts, and other visual representations to facilitate understanding and collaboration.

entries.label: Slack
entries.description: A messaging platform designed for teams, offering real-time communication, file sharing, and integration with various tools to enhance collaboration.

entries.label: Arcade
entries.description: A platform that allows businesses to create interactive demos and tutorials to showcase their products, enhancing customer engagement and understanding.

entries.label: LinkedIn Insigts
entries.description: LinkedIn Insights provides data and analytics on talent pools, industry trends, and company benchmarks to inform recruitment and workforce planning strategies.

entries.label: LinkedIn Recruiter
entries.description: LinkedIn Recruiter is a talent search and recruitment tool that allows hiring professionals to find, connect with, and manage potential candidates on LinkedIn.

entries.label: Asana
entries.description: A project management tool that helps teams organise and manage their work, track progress, and collaborate effectively to achieve their goals.

entries.label: Granola.ai
entries.description: Granola.ai is an AI tool designed for recruiters to capture and organise notes during interviews. It transcribes conversations in real-time and provides summaries, saving time and improving accuracy.

entries.label: Fetcher.ai
entries.description: Fetcher.ai is a recruitment platform that combines AI with human expertise to automate candidate sourcing and outreach, helping companies find and engage top talent efficiently.

entries.label: HireVue
entries.description: HireVue integrates video interviewing with AI-driven assessments and scheduling tools. It streamlines the recruitment process, offering features like automated candidate evaluations and predictive analytics.

entries.label: Interview.Prep.ai
entries.description: Interview.Prep.ai provides AI-driven tools to help candidates prepare for interviews by simulating real interview scenarios and offering feedback on performance.

entries.label: Candidate.fyi
entries.description: Candidate.fyi is a platform that helps companies improve the candidate experience by providing tools for interview preparation, feedback collection, and process transparency.

entries.label: Huru.ai
entries.description: Huru.ai provides an AI-powered interview preparation app that helps candidates practice and improve their interview skills through simulated questions and feedback.

entries.label: Paradox.ai
entries.description: Paradox.ai offers an AI assistant named Olivia that automates recruiting tasks such as screening, scheduling, and candidate communication to enhance efficiency.

entries.label: Storydoc
entries.description: Storydoc is a platform that enables users to create interactive and engaging presentations, transforming static content into dynamic stories to enhance audience engagement.

entries.label: Pitch
entries.description: Pitch is a collaborative presentation software that enables teams to create, edit, and share professional presentations with real-time collaboration features.

entries.label: Juro
entries.description: Juro is a contract automation platform that streamlines the creation, execution, and management of contracts, offering a collaborative workspace for legal and business teams.

entries.label: Test Partnerships
entries.description: Test Partnerships provides psychometric assessments and aptitude tests to assist companies in making informed hiring decisions by evaluating candidates' skills and abilities.

entries.label: DISC
entries.description: DISC is a behavioral assessment tool that helps individuals and teams understand communication styles and improve workplace interactions by analysing personality traits.

entries.label: Miro
entries.description: Miro is an online collaborative whiteboard platform that enables teams to brainstorm, plan, and collaborate in real-time, enhancing remote and in-person workflows.

entries.label: TestGorillas
entries.description: TestGorilla offers a range of pre-employment tests to help companies assess candidates' skills, personality, and suitability for roles, aiding in data-driven hiring decisions.

entries.label: SynthesiaAI
entries.description: Synthesia is an advanced form of an Artificial Intelligence platform that converts text into a real-looking video with virtual characters.

entries.label: Zapier
entries.description: An automation tool that connects different apps and services, allowing users to automate workflows without the need for coding.

entries.label: AgenticAI Sourcing and Screening AI
entries.description: These AI agents combine sourcing and screening capabilities to streamline recruitment. They autonomously identify and engage potential candidates, evaluate their qualifications, and recommend the most suitable matches.

entries.label: Rice Framework
entries.description: A prioritisation framework used in product management that stands for Reach, Impact, Confidence, and Effort, helping teams decide which projects to focus on to maximise impact.

entries.label: Implementation Framework
entries.description: A structured, scalable implementation framework and methodology to standardise client-related onboardings, ensuring consistency, enhancing collaboration, and establishing clear accountability across teams.

entries.label: Project Management Framework
entries.description: A structured, scalable project management framework and methodology to standardise client-related projects, ensuring consistency, enhancing collaboration, and establishing clear accountability across teams.
